metadata.title: CVE-2021-37601 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
muc.lib.lua in Prosody 0.11.0 through 0.11.9 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information (list of admins, members, owners, and banned entities of a Multi-User chat room) in some common configurations.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-37601` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

prosody - 0.11.9-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: prosody package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.11.9-2').
